description.displayText: Leticia has worked with us for the last 6 months and has been great. As a house keeper, she is very detail oriented and extremely thoughtful. She organizes the house and pays attention to our preferences. As a babysitter, she was very responsible with our 2 year old, made sure she had fun and understanding of our daughters sleep routine. Would highly recommend!
description.originalText: Leticia has worked with us for the last 6 months and has been great. As a house keeper, she is very detail oriented and extremely thoughtful. description.displayText: I hired Leticia to do a deep cleaning of our home.  I have very high expectations, which she definitely exceeded!  Not only was she nice and polite, Leticia worked so efficiently and did such a wonderful job, that I immediately knew I wanted her to return to assist with regular cleanings.  I highly recommend Leticia.
description.originalText: I hired Leticia to do a deep cleaning of our home.  I have very high expectations, which she definitely exceeded!  Not only was she nice and polite, Leticia worked so efficiently and did such a wonderful job, that I immediately knew I wanted her to return to assist with regular cleanings.  I highly recommend Leticia.

description.displayText: Leticia has worked for our family of three children for two years. Our family's needs have changed, but we are happy to recommend Leticia for a child care and/or housekeeping position. During the time Leticia was with us, she cared for the children with compassion and laughter. Her responsibilities included driving the children to activities, meal preparation, putting children down for naps, and engaging in creative play. While the children were in school, she did our family's laundry and deep cleaned the house. Leticia was always attentive to the children yet managed to have the house neat and tidy when I came home. I highly recommend Leticia.
